name: Ningen no Sato
startIntroPart1:
Greetings to you, Keine Kamashirasawa, protector and guardian of the Ningen no Sato. 
							Ningen no Sato is the name for the largest human community within Gensokyo. Commonly referred to as 'the human village' by the other inhabitants of Gensokyo, it remains the safest place for humans in that land.
startIntroPart2:
One of the reasons for that sense of security is that the Ningen no Sato is protected by Keine Kamishirasawa, a were-hakutaku. She possesses the ability to conceal the history -- and thus existence -- of things, and has at times used this ability to safeguard the village from harm. Under the light of a full moon, she transforms into her hakutaku form, which allows her to create, rather than conceal things. She also serves the community as a schoolteacher.
							Knowledgeable and protective Keine, will you guard the people of the Ningen no Sato as they seek to expand and grow? Can you create a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I'm afraid you have become a threat to the people under my protection.
attacked: I will protect the people of this community with all of my strength.
defeated: It seems that I will have to become stronger in order to fulfill my obligations. Perhaps, in time, we will meet again.
introduction: Ahh, a newcomer to the Ningen no Sato?  Please make yourself comfortable, I am Keine Kamashirasawa.
neutralHello: Oh, hello!  Welcome to the Ningen no Sato.
hateHello: If you stop by the school some time, I shall prepare tea for us
tradeRequest: My people need something of you, can we trade it?.
